articles.author: Analysis by Luke McGee, CNN
articles.title: The conditions are perfect for a populist resurgence in Europe - CNN
articles.description: On Sunday night, it is widely expected that Giorgia Meloni will become Italy's first female prime minister.

articles.title: Europe should open to Russians fleeing Putin mobilisation, European Council chief says - The Irish Times
articles.description: Election officials and police carry ballots to homes in sham referendums to join Russia in four regions of eastern Ukraine
articles.content:
The president of the European Council has called on Europe to open to fleeing Russians in the wake of President Vladimir Putins mobilisation order.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: At least 76 die after migrant boat sinks off Syrian coast from Lebanon - ABC News
articles.description: Syrian authorities are quoting survivors saying there were between 120 and 150 people onboard, bound for Europe.
articles.content:
Lebanon's transport minister says at least 76 people are dead after the migrant boat they were on sank off the Syrian coast after sailing from Lebanon this week.

articles.author: Lucia Stein
articles.title: Giorgia Meloni could make history as Italy's first female PM. She would also be its first far-right leader since Benito Mussolini - ABC News
articles.description: Giorgia Meloni has risen from political obscurity to potentially become Italy's first far-right female leader. But her critics warn her ascension comes at a fragile time in Europe and evokes memories of Italy's fascist past.
articles.content:
When Prime Minister Mario Draghi's government spectacularly collapsed in July, sparking political upheaval and sending Italy into an early poll, one politician was set to benefit enormously.
Giorgia… [+10710 chars]
